website_summaries.verdict: Doesn’t ship as a formed rectangular block, so it’s offered at a very low price per ounce.
pros: Some people find the small chunks of alum block in this product to be easier to hold and use than a large block
Good value for those who don’t want a rectangular block
Consists of ammonium alum, which means it works better as an anti-perspirant than as a product to help with skin suffering from razor burn
cons: Doesn’t ship in a protective plastic case

customer_reviews.title: Seems like real alum to me
customer_reviews.text: They look the same as the picture. These are good to tighten your skin, & private areas.
customer_reviews.author: victorian0927

customer_reviews.title: Great antiperspirant! No more white marks on my clothes! and earth friendly
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these as underarm antiperspirant. I just wet my under arm out of the shower with a rag so my armpits are damp and rub the crystal around each under arm for like 15-20 seconds and havent smelled any bad odor. Plus good for the environment
customer_reviews.author: Mark Domino

customer_reviews.title: So I recommend for us to use this since I remembered it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had use tawas a long time ago u til recently, my husband who uses your typical deodorant makes his scent a little off. So I recommend for us to use this since I remembered it worked well. Been using it for 6 months now and no issues we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Lazarevic

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but rough chunks and small broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This really works. Doesn't keep me from sweating but keeps it from getting smelly. This package, with loose chunks, is much cheaper per ounce than the smoothly shaped ones. Cons: The package I received contains only three chunks large enough to use on armpits. There are also a lot of small pieces that aren't useful. Conclusion: Even if I discard the small pieces and file down rough edges on the large ones, I'll still have more usable stone for the price than if I'd ordered the smooth pieces.
customer_reviews.author: bw

customer_reviews.title: The best natural way to “Tighten up”
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Alum rock for its tightening properties for almost 2 years now and it does just that. As a woman we all want to feel our youngest down there and although I’ve never had any complaints or been told otherwise it makes me more confident sometimes going into a new situation knowing that I’ve used my alum. It tightens your skin just about anywhere. Hands, downstairs, I have a friend that even baths in it and swears it’s help tighten her skin all together! It’s odorless and easy to use and I have extremely sensitive skin and this never irritates me not one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha K.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it ASAP
customer_reviews.text: Love love this product, I stop using deodorant because I don’t need it anymore, I was the type of person that no matter what I will do my arm pits will suet and smell and this is thing is my holly grail . Highly recommended ❤️❤️

My one grandson who has this problem playing hockey told me it really works. I used it as a kid and adult playing racquetball, hiking and biking now.

customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT! I don't like using deodorants but so get body odor, specially when I workout. I crushed a piece of it into fine powder and stored it in a box. I use a makeup brush to put it on my underarms after shower and it works wonders! It doesn't only work well I actually feel good about it. Would purchase again but maybe in a powder form next time.

customer_reviews.title: Natural deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Excellent natural deodorant. Can also be used as a deodorizer for your shoes, just insert inside shoes to keep odors at bay. As a deodorant, take a piece and wet it, then run on your armpits; it will last a long time. Price is reasonable.

I hate using deodorant, because the always mess up my clothes. But since I have been using this stone from day one, I am so happy. No more smell at all and it leaves you fresh and clean. Lol. FYI, I also tried it on my face, but it was just my experience. Since I have a oil face it helps me to not sweat too much.
